title: Ayurvedic Hair Growth Serum — Bhringraj + Castor
excerpt: Concentrated nightly serum to nourish the scalp, support follicles, and reduce hair fall using bhringraj and cold-pressed castor oil.
content:
## What Is This Hair Growth Serum?
A potent, concentrated serum combining bhringraj extract, cold-pressed castor oil, and amla oil infusion to nourish the scalp, support follicle health, and reduce hair fall when used consistently.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Bhringraj is a classical hair tonic used to strengthen roots and promote healthy hair. Castor oil adds density and nourishment, while amla supports follicular health with antioxidants.

### Key Benefits
- Nourishes scalp and hair follicles.
- Helps reduce hair fall and supports shine.
- Nightly application encourages deeper absorption.

## Ingredients
- Bhringraj extract
- Cold-pressed castor oil
- Amla oil infusion

## Usage Instructions
- Apply nightly to the scalp (a few drops), massage gently for 5–10 minutes, leave overnight, and wash in the morning. Use consistently for several months for best results.

## Packaging
- Amber dropper bottle for precise application.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test prior to use. Those with very oily scalps should use sparingly. Consult a trichologist for persistent hair loss or scalp conditions.

## Why Choose This Serum?
A traditional, concentrated formula intended to support root health and visible improvement over time with regular use.
